body.name: PYUNKANG YUL Calming Deep Moisture Toner - Face Toner for Women containing AHA and PHA - for Teens and Adults - Astringent for Face - Korean Facial Toner - 150ml 5.07 Fl. Oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 23 mins
features: 🌿 WHY PYUNKANG YUL? - Along with know-how recipe of Pyunkang Yul Eastern Medicine Clinic, specialized in treating skin and respiratory diseases for about 50 years, the toner helps to calm angry skin comfortably by carefully selected ingredients found in nature and rigorous testing.

🌿 NO HARMFUL SUBSTANCES - Calming Deep Moisture Toner has a mild, low pH formulation similar to that of smooth healthy skin and the toner is dermatologically tested and has completed skin irritation test with zero-irritation result; 20 kinds of harmful ingredients are not added; in addition, all ingredients are in EWG safety grade

🌿 SUITABLE FOR ACNE-PRONE AND SENSITIVE SKIN TYPES - Non-comedogenicity test completed (Pore Tightening, Sebum control, Improves skin texture, Oil balancing, Corneous care) and can be used comfortably for acne-prone, sensitive and irritated skin types

🌿 STRONG MOISTURIZING - Panthenol and 5 Hyaluronic Acids attract moisture up to 1000 times its weight, provide a deep hydrating feeling by quickly supplying moisture to dry skin and White Willow Bark, AHA and PHA ingredients clean up old dead skin cells and smoothen skin texture. The toner has a light and fresh texture which is rich in natural ingredients and provides a perfect absorbing to the deep inside of the skin without being greasy

🌿 PERFECT FOR IRRITATED AND SENSITIVE SKIN TYPES - Through Centella Asiatica extract (also called as Cica or Madecassoside), Tea Tree and Lonicera Japonica Flower Extract, known as a representative soothing ingredient, that quickly calms angry skin in a healthy way and controls excess sebum also moisturizes irritated skin without worrying about irritation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Since being pregnant nothing has worked for my skin, everything seems to break me out now. I was happy to stumble upon this toner it is THE ONLY product my skin will tolerate right now. I don’t use creams or cleansers (unless I wear makeup that day) I just swipe my face with this twice a day and go. It moisturizes and balances my skin and since using it my face has been bright & hormonal bumps have been under control. I’m satisfied. Curious about other products in the line but my pregnancy skin seems to think less is best so I’ll probably just stick to this toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Friend loves it
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my friend and she loves it, she has sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate her at all. And it moisturizes her face so well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and calming
reviews.reviewText: It works. My second time buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So calming so gentle this is by far the best toner I've ever used. My skin feels refreshed after using and not tight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this for a couple days now and it is a pretty basic toner. I like the face masks that this brand makes so I thought I would try their toner. All I can say is Mid. I don't think there would be a difference between putting water on my face and this toner. Made my under eyes burn a little. I would only recommend this to someone who wants very basic skincare or wants to mix the toner with another product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s good so far
reviews.reviewText: It’s very calming not irritating from what I’m getting at 😁👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a good toner
reviews.reviewText: First time using this toner and love it will buy again

After two weeks of using this toner daily, my skin feels better hydrated and appears brighter.I'm in my late 30s, with sensitive combination skin. This toner is scent free, and the consistency of water. I apply it to clean skin with my finger tips, I pat it into my face. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin soft. It's very gentle and causes me no irritation. It is not greasy or sticky at all, and it pairs beautifully with lotions, sunscreen, and makeup.My skin loves this toner. It feels noticeably softer, and it's plump and moisturized even though the winter air is dry as can be. My skin is looking a bit brighter overall, and with less texture. I usually fight with jawline acne, and I'm actually finding that it is diminishing now that I'm using this toner regularly. The toner feels instantly cooling and soothing on my skin, which makes using it a very pleasant experience. Full marks from me!

reviews.reviewerName: Gusti Ayu Made Surya Dewi Ardiyani

reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic calming toner. I’ve been using it for about a week now and it leaves my skin very soft and hydrated.
actually great product, I only got it a couple weeks ago and already notice a difference in my skin. def repurchasing 😁
評価が良かったので購入しましたが、私の肌には肌荒れ改善などもなく、可もなく不可もなくという感じでした。
